intro.title: Hi, I'm Gregory.
presentation: I'm a software engineer from France.
I made this website to learn and practice React JS.
intro.footer: I'm always looking to learn more!

work.title: Work
content: I worked in the banking industry for Sopra Banking Software as a software developper engineer from May 2016 to May 2018.
After taking a break to travel and live in South Korea, I came back to Europe and am now looking for a job as a full-stack developper.

contact.title: Contact
contact.content: Feel free to reach out if you have any questions!

You can find a more detailed resume in this section.
Or if you prefer, you can download it here.

Preparatory classes : two-year undergraduate intensive course in mathematics and physics, Lycée Chaptal, Paris, France
High School Degree, with focus on mathematics and physics. With high honors.

about.title: About
content: I made this website to practice what I learned about React JS
... and to not stay completly inactive while I was not working.
